trans-unit.source: Ensures that an authentication object is present in the context.
trans-unit.target: 确保身份验证对象存在于上下文。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultAuthenticationModule ensures that the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance is set to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for each request.
trans-unit.target: DefaultAuthenticationModule 确保<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>实例设置为<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>为每个请求的对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DefaultAuthenticationModule examines the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event and before the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: DefaultAuthenticationModule 检查<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性后的<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件和之前<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property is `null`, the DefaultAuthenticationModule sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that contains no user information.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性是`null`，DefaultAuthenticationModule 集<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性<xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>不包含任何用户信息的对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication module sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.StatusCode%2A> property to 401, the DefaultAuthenticationModule will render an access-denied error page.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证模块设置<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.StatusCode%2A>属性设置为 401，DefaultAuthenticationModule 将呈现一个拒绝访问错误页面。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.StatusCode%2A> property is set to a value greater than 200, the DefaultAuthenticationModule object will end the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.StatusCode%2A>属性设置为一个值大于 200，DefaultAuthenticationModule 对象将结束请求。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, only HTTP modules that subscribe to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event are called prior to the completion of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，仅 HTTP 模块，这些订阅<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件在当前请求完成之前调用。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>

trans-unit.source: The DefaultAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event.
trans-unit.target: DefaultAuthenticationModule 公开<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件。</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来提供自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>实例。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying an event named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the application's Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件可通过指定名为事件**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此构造函数来创建实例的<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: 后调用的构造函数，它调用<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>方法以初始化新<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the request has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 请求已经过身份验证后发生。

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证事件引发之后<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: It is used to ensure that the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance is populated with an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 它用于确保<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>实例填入<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the application's Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问的身份验证事件<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> object in the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs>对象在**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>向自定义实例<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that contains no user information.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>到实例<xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>不包含任何用户信息的对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event and before the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**后引发事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件和之前<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance can affect the behavior of your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有一个部分，其中取决于要拒绝或允许访问应用程序的用户名称，修改<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>实例可能会影响你的应用程序的行为。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the section in your configuration.
trans-unit.target: 请确保在设置的用户名称**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件被视为时在你配置中指定部分。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the Web application is running in IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode, the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果 Web 应用程序正在运行 IIS 7.0 中在集成模式下，身份验证事件的<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>则不会引发。</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If the `mode` attribute of the configuration element is set to "None" and the application subscribes to the Authenticate event, a <xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException> error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果`mode`配置元素的属性设置为"None"和应用程序订阅进行身份验证事件，<xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>引发错误。</xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，若要接收身份验证通知，订阅<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>实例。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在集成模式下的兼容性问题的详细信息，请参阅[从 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序迁移到 IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放所有资源，以外使用的内存<xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of events.
trans-unit.target: Init 方法可确保<xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>包含在处理事件。</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref>实例。
